title: Using things with images of animals on them - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: fatima says is it permissible to own and use backpack that has animals on it the picture of animals if it's a drawing then you should not keep it and you should dispose of it it's if it's just a photograph a real photograph not photoshop and and not change or edited there is no problem in having such a bag to stay away just to be safe rather than sorry is better
